title: What is the 3-year CAGR from FY2021 to FY2024 for the Curtiss-Wright Corporation (NYSE: CW)'s operating income within its Aerospace & Industrial segment? Express the answer as a % rounded to 2 decimal places.
description:
Find the FY2021 Aerospace & Industrial segment operating income $121.817 M
 
 Find the FY2024 Aerospace & Industrial segment operating income $148.023 M
 
 Calculate the CAGR between FY2021 and FY2024 operating income by dividing the final value by the initial value, raised to the power of 1/n (where n is the number of years) minus 1
 
 (148.023 / 121.817)^(1/3) − 1 = 6.71%.

rubric.criteria: Find that the FY2021 Aerospace & Industrial operating income = $121.817 M
Find that the FY2024 Aerospace & Industrial operating income = $148.023 M
Present the final answer as a %, rounded to two decimal places
